name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized PowerShell Script Execution
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker used a PowerShell script to execute unauthorized commands. Immediate mitigation steps are launched to stop the attack and prevent further exploitation.

if-condition--e6b2b3e7-70c5-4eed-bf20-ab.name: Check if PowerShell process is running

action--760bef7f-ec11-4121-9ea6-982fe065.name: Kill the malicious PowerShell process
action--760bef7f-ec11-4121-9ea6-982fe065.description: Terminate the ongoing PowerShell script to stop further actions by the attacker.

action--b2d5b64d-3053-48f7-9009-f5eeb4d6.name: Delete the suspicious file from temp directory
action--b2d5b64d-3053-48f7-9009-f5eeb4d6.description: Remove the suspicious executable dropped by the script to prevent potential harm.

loop--f1e09a84-0e1f-42a5-bf59-7f7e7305b3.name: Block outbound connections to malicious IPs
loop--f1e09a84-0e1f-42a5-bf59-7f7e7305b3.description: Block all outbound connections to the identified malicious IPs.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Block Malicious IP" dir=out action=block remoteip=${ip}

action--890ecbc9-c568-4b3e-9c3a-028b1313.name: Scan the system for additional threats
action--890ecbc9-c568-4b3e-9c3a-028b1313.description: Perform a full scan of the system for potential threats left undetected.

action--b10b77d7-2d87-46d5-b6ea-bbb66599.name: Monitor for re-execution attempts
action--b10b77d7-2d87-46d5-b6ea-bbb66599.description: Set up monitoring for any further attempts to execute commands
